section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: Renault Trucks is one of the leading vehicle manufacturers, building on the legacy of more than a century of French truck know-how. It offers transport professionals with a wide range of services and vehicles adapted to local and regional distribution, construction and long distance activities. Renault Trucks employs about 9,500 people.
